channel.title: Sections on Marguerite Obolensky
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Marguerite Obolensky

item.description:
Welcome! I am a PhD candidate in the Sustainable Development program at Columbia University’s School of International and Public Affairs.

I work on questions in environmental and climate economics using tools from empirical IO.

In July 2026, I will be joining UCL as an Lecturer (Assistant Professor) of Economics, following a one-year postdoc at Northwestern Kellogg School of Management.

Curriculum Vitae
